definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: Build a sub-process that you can use to manage larger business systems.
sentences.chinese: 构建可以用来管理较大业务系统的子流程。

sentences.english: Union was a tool used by the capitalists in their vain attempt to damp down the labour movement.
sentences.chinese: 那个黄色工会是资本家妄图用来扑灭工人运动的工具。

sentences.english: For example, this is the place to store configuration variables that will be provided in FreeRADIUS. conf.
sentences.chinese: 例如，这个地方用来存放配置文件的变量。

sentences.english: Usually songs that are good to dance have terrible words.
sentences.chinese: 通常来说，可以用来伴舞的歌曲歌词都很差劲。

sentences.english: This special blade on his knife is for picking stones out of horses' feet.
sentences.chinese: 他刀上有一特制刀刃，是用来剔去马蹄上的石头的。

sentences.english: Semi-precious stones were used for inlay ornamentation.
sentences.chinese: 准宝石的石头用来做镶嵌装饰。

sentences.english: A light-colored tuff used in hydraulic cement.
sentences.chinese: 粗面凝灰岩一种用来生产硬。

sentences.english: And the pump has a wooden handle to prevent burns to the hands.
sentences.chinese: 而且抽气筒还安有一个木制的把手用来防止手被烫伤。

sentences.english: The history of superstitious pratices can often help to explain them.
sentences.chinese: 迷信风俗的历史往往可以用来解释它本身。

sentences.english: Used to set the track pre-gap for all tracks in sectors globally.
sentences.chinese: 用来设置为所有全域磁区内轨道的轨道预先间隙。

sentences.english: I could be spending all this time learning to fly.
sentences.chinese: 我可以把所有这些时间都用来学飞行。

sentences.english: I think that a luxury is nothing but an indulgence to showoff one's wealth.
sentences.chinese: 我想奢侈品只是用来彰显自己的财气罢了。

sentences.english: There are several vacant plots available for building on in the area.
sentences.chinese: 那个地区还有好几块空地皮可以用来造房子。

sentences.english: This is what we have, rather dully, taken care to affirm at first.
sentences.chinese: 这个是我们曾经费心来处理，起初是用来作为肯定。

sentences.english: All four infrared detectors aboard WISE were used to make this image.
sentences.chinese: 船上所有四个红外探测器被用来获得这一图片。

sentences.english: Xinxi girls such as the aptly used to describe the extreme, particularly in the examination.
sentences.chinese: 心细如发用来形容女生贴切至极，尤其在考试中。

definition: to use for the purpose of/to serve as
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
to treat as/to regard as/to look upon as
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
to use/to employ/to apply/to make use of
